attributes.action: close the loophole that has allowed baby p's killers to get away with out being charghed for murder and make the punishment greater than 14 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petiton against child killers who cannot face murder charges because of a loop hole in our law, if there are more than 1 person involved and neither one can be attributed to the final act of murder, the greatest punishment they can face is 14 years for this cruel and callous act.
I wish for the law to be changed and the punishment more severe for this awful crime.
14 years is simply not enough.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "close the loophole that has allowed baby p's killers to get away with out being charghed for murder and make the punishment greater than 14 years."
